linearState.title: Send Slack message on meeting extraction
linearState.description:
Slack notifications for meeting extraction results.

PR #2238: Open (in review)
Link: [https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2238](https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2238)
Author: drios-gather

Key changes in PR #2238:

* Notifications pipeline:
  * Schemas: Add OperationResult and MeetingExtractionNotificationMessage in js-services/admin-backend/src/jobs/models.ts and src/jobs/models.py (kept in sync).
  * Ambient Extraction: After successful Linear operations, send SQS message in js-services/ambient-extraction/src/processors/meetingProcessor.ts; map REQUEST_CLARIFICATION to SKIP in notification payloads.
  * SQS client: New js-services/ambient-extraction/src/services/sqsClient.ts with ARN/URL/name resolution and FIFO IDs; add dependency @aws-sdk/client-sqs to ambient-extraction package.
* Slack Bot:
  * Support new message type meeting_extraction_notification in js-services/slack-bot/src/jobs/slackEventProcessor.ts; fetch channel via getChannelIdForLinearTeam.
  * Formatter: New js-services/slack-bot/src/ambient/meetingNotificationFormatter.ts (text + blocks).
  * Channel mapping helper: getChannelIdForLinearTeam in js-services/slack-bot/src/ambient/channelMappings.ts.

Notes:

* Code will be tested in staging; most of the diff is yarn.lock.

Track the work to ungate and release the Gong connector across admin backend, admin frontend, and shared feature allowlist.

PR #2230: Open (in review)
Link: [https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2230](https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2230)
Author: chandlerroth

Key changes in PR #2230:

* Remove connector:gong feature flag/allowlist entries in backend (TypeScript) and shared Python utils
* Admin frontend: remove feature gating checks for Gong; set comingSoon=false for Gong in IntegrationsProvider
* Gong integration UI: enable Connect button (remove dependency on feature flag)
* Update types to drop 'connector:gong' from FeatureKey union where appropriate
* Tests: adjust feature-service test fixture (swapped to existing feature key for coverage)

Notes:

* This change promotes Gong from gated to public availability in the admin UI and backend feature gating systems.
* Ensure appropriate release notes and connector docs are updated post-merge.

Relevant changes for this issue:

Context: This promotes the Asana auth layout jump fix originally in PR #2236 into production.

linearState.title: Update Responses API integration to support ZDR (copy)
linearState.description:
Tracking additional ZDR compatibility updates.

PR #2229 (open): [https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2229](https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2229)
Title: zdr fix

Key changes in PR #2229:

* Include reasoning.encrypted_content in Responses API call (include: \["reasoning.encrypted_content"\]) for ZDR compatibility.
* Update \_process_response and \_agent_think to return reasoning_items and propagate them across turns.
* Set store=False and rely on encrypted reasoning items to preserve context with ZDR enabled.
* In stream_advanced_search_answer, prepend prior reasoning_items to subsequent requests to maintain multi‑turn reasoning under ZDR.
* Adjust function signatures and error paths to handle reasoning_items consistently.

Status: Open (in review)

linearState.title: Base: Update Responses API integration to support ZDR
linearState.description:
Problem:

* We want to enable ZDR on our OpenAI organization
* Enabling ZDR may break the OpenAI Responses API, as `store` will no longer be respected
* To continue using the Responses API, we must update our strategy to utilize`reasoning.encrypted_content`
